verses.verse: When Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall bring<WH935> thee into the land<WH776> whither thou goest<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it<WH5394>, and shall cast out many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> before<WH6440> thee<WH2850>, the Hittite, and the Girgashite<WH1622>, and the Amorite<WH567>, and the Canaanite<WH3669>, and the Perizzite<WH6522>, and the Hivite<WH2340>, and the Jebusite<WH2983>, seven<WH7651> nations<WH1471> greater<WH7227> and mightier than thou<WH6099>;

and when Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> them up before<WH6440> thee<WH5221>, and thou shalt smite them<WH2763>; then thou shalt utterly destroy<WH2763> them<WH3772>: thou shalt make no covenant<WH1285> with them<WH2603>, nor show mercy unto them;
neither shalt thou make marriages<WH2859> with them<WH1323>; thy daughter thou shalt not give<WH5414> unto his son<WH1121>, nor his daughter<WH1323> shalt thou take<WH3947> unto thy son<WH1121>.

For he will turn away<WH5493> thy son<WH1121> from following<WH310> me<WH5647>, that they may serve other<WH312> gods<WH430>: so will the anger<WH639> of Jehovah<WH3068> be kindled<WH2734> against you<WH8045>, and he will destroy thee quickly<WH4118>.

But thus shall ye deal<WH6213> with them<WH7665>: ye shall break down their altars<WH4196>, and dash<WH7665> in pieces their pillars<WH4676>, and hew down<WH1438> their Asherim<WH842>, and burn<WH8313> their graven images<WH6456> with fire<WH784>.

For thou art a holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> unto Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>: Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath chosen<WH977> thee to be a people<WH5971> for his own possession<WH5459>, above all peoples<WH5971> that are upon the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>.
Jehovah <WH3068> did not set his love<WH2836> upon you<WH977>, nor choose you<WH7230>, because ye were more in number than any people<WH5971>; for ye were the fewest<WH4592> of all peoples<WH5971>:

but because Jehovah<WH3068> loveth you<WH8104>, and because he would keep the oath<WH7621> which he sware<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1>, hath Jehovah<WH3068> brought you out<WH3318> with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and redeemed<WH6299> you out<WH3318> of the house<WH1004> of bondage<WH5650>, from the hand<WH3027> of Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>.

Know <WH3045> therefore that Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, he is God<WH430>, the faithful<WH539> God<WH430>, who keepeth<WH8104> covenant<WH1285> and lovingkindness<WH2617> with them that love<WH157> him and keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> to a thousand<WH505> generations<WH1755>,
and repayeth<WH7999> them that hate<WH8130> him to their face<WH6440>, to destroy<WH6> them<WH309>: he will not be slack to him that hateth<WH8130> him<WH7999>, he will repay him to his face<WH6440>.
Thou shalt therefore keep<WH8104> the commandment<WH4687>, and the statutes<WH2706>, and the ordinances<WH4941>, which I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117>, to do them<WH6213>.

And it shall come to pass<WH6118>, because ye hearken<WH8085> to these ordinances<WH4941>, and keep<WH8104> and do<WH6213> them<WH3068>, that Jehovah thy God<WH430> will keep<WH8104> with thee the covenant<WH1285> and the lovingkindness<WH2617> which he sware<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1>:

and he will love<WH157> thee<WH1288>, and bless thee<WH7235>, and multiply thee<WH1288>; he will also bless the fruit<WH6529> of thy body<WH990> and the fruit<WH6529> of thy ground<WH127>, thy grain<WH1715> and thy new wine<WH8492> and thine oil<WH3323>, the increase<WH7698> of thy cattle<WH504> and the young<WH6251> of thy flock<WH6629>, in the land<WH127> which he sware<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1> to give thee<WH5414>.
Thou shalt be blessed<WH1288> above all peoples<WH5971>: there shall not be male<WH6135> or female barren<WH6135> among you<WH929>, or among your cattle.

And Jehovah<WH3068> will take away<WH5493> from thee all sickness<WH2483>; and none of the evil<WH7451> diseases<WH4064> of Egypt<WH4714>, which thou knowest<WH3045>, will he put<WH7760> upon thee<WH5414>, but will lay them upon all them that hate thee<WH8130>.

And thou shalt consume<WH398> all the peoples<WH5971> that Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> unto thee<WH5869>; thine eye shall not pity<WH2347> them<WH5647>: neither shalt thou serve their gods<WH430>; for that will be a snare unto thee<WH4170>.
If thou shalt say<WH559> in thy heart<WH3824>, These nations<WH1471> are more<WH7227> than I<WH349>; how can<WH3201> I dispossess them<WH3423>?
thou shalt not be afraid<WH3372> of them<WH2142>: thou shalt well remember<WH2142> what Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> did<WH6213> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, and unto all Egypt<WH4714>;

the great<WH1419> trials<WH4531> which thine eyes<WH5869> saw<WH7200>, and the signs<WH226>, and the wonders<WH4159>, and the mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and the outstretched<WH5186> arm<WH2220>, whereby Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> brought thee out<WH3318>: so shall Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> do<WH6213> unto all the peoples<WH5971> of whom thou art afraid<WH3373>.
Moreover Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will send<WH7971> the hornet<WH6880> among them<WH7604>, until they that are left, and hide<WH5641> themselves<WH6>, perish from before thee<WH6440>.
Thou shalt not be affrighted<WH6206> at<WH6440> them<WH3068>; for Jehovah thy God<WH430> is in the midst<WH7130> of thee<WH1419>, a great God<WH410> and a terrible<WH3372>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will cast out<WH5394> those<WH411> nations<WH1471> before<WH6440> thee by little<WH4592> and little<WH4592>: thou mayest<WH3201> not consume<WH3615> them at once<WH4118>, lest the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> increase upon thee<WH7235>.
But Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will deliver<WH5414> them up before thee<WH6440>, and will discomfit<WH1949> them with a great<WH1419> discomfiture<WH4103>, until they be destroyed<WH8045>.

And he will deliver<WH5414> their kings<WH4428> into thy hand<WH3027>, and thou shalt make their name<WH8034> to perish<WH6> from under heaven<WH8064>: there shall no man<WH376> be able to stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> thee<WH8045>, until thou have destroyed them.

The graven images<WH6456> of their gods<WH430> shall ye burn<WH8313> with fire<WH784>: thou shalt not covet<WH2530> the silver<WH3701> or the gold<WH2091> that is on them<WH3947>, nor take it unto thee<WH3369>, lest thou be snared therein<WH8441>; for it is an abomination to Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>.

And thou shalt not bring<WH935> an abomination<WH8441> into thy house<WH1004>, and become a devoted thing<WH2764> like unto it<WH8262>: thou shalt utterly detest<WH8262> it<WH8581>, and thou shalt utterly abhor<WH8581> it<WH2764>; for it is a devoted thing.
